grammar.en: As much as N / To the extent of N
When V / At the time of V

grammar.en: You see, it's because V (giving background reason)
You know / As you know (shared information)
Oh, I see / I notice that (new realization)
Shall we V? / Do you think V?
Try V-ing / Have the experience of V-ing
Plan to V / Intend to V
